sourcesContent:
<ion-app>
  <ion-split-pane contentId="main">
    <ion-menu contentId="main" menuId="main">
      <ion-header>
        <ion-toolbar>
          <ion-title class="subtitulo">Menu</ion-title>
        </ion-toolbar>
      </ion-header>
      <ion-content>
        <ion-menu-toggle *ngIf="doctores.rol == rold">

          <ion-item button="true" detail="true" [routerLink]="['/tabiniciald']">
            <ion-label class="normal">Pantalla principal</ion-label>
            <ion-icon slot="start" name="home-outline"></ion-icon>
          </ion-item>

          <ion-item button="true" detail="true" [routerLink]="['/set-reportes']">
            <ion-label class="normal">Agregar reportes</ion-label>
            <ion-icon slot="start" name="reader-outline"></ion-icon>
          </ion-item>

          <ion-item button="true" detail="true" [routerLink]="['/lista-reporte']">
            <ion-label class="normal">Lista reportes</ion-label>
            <ion-icon slot="start" name="list-outline"></ion-icon>
          </ion-item>

          <ion-item button="true" detail="true" (click)="logout()">
            <ion-label class="normal">Cerrar Sesion</ion-label>
            <ion-icon slot="start" name="log-out-outline"></ion-icon>
          </ion-item>
        </ion-menu-toggle>
        <ion-menu-toggle *ngIf="pacientes.rol == paciente">
        
          <ion-item button="true" detail="true" [routerLink]="['/tabinicialp']">
            <ion-label class="normal">Pantalla principal</ion-label>
            <ion-icon slot="start" name="home-outline"></ion-icon>
          </ion-item>
      
        
          <ion-item button="true" detail="true" (click)="logout()">
            <ion-label class="normal">Cerrar Sesion</ion-label>
            <ion-icon slot="start" name="log-out-outline"></ion-icon>
          </ion-item>
        </ion-menu-toggle>

      </ion-content>

    </ion-menu>
    <ion-router-outlet id="main"></ion-router-outlet>
  </ion-split-pane>

</ion-app>
